description: Create a new developer reference type
permissions: Allowed for admin users or users who are manager members of the broker associated with the developer.
validation_notes: --name is required; --developer is required; subject types must include at least one value and each value must be one of: JobProductionPlan, MaterialType, Project; name must be unique per developer.

flags.name: --subject-types
flags.validation: Must include at least one value and each value must be one of: JobProductionPlan, MaterialType, Project.
